column1: * 1926 - Voice actor Don Messick is born.
* 1937 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to George Allen and Unwin concerning the promotion of The Hobbit.
* 1970 – The Mythcon 1 is held at wikipedia:Harvey Mudd Collegein wikipedia:Claremont
* 1989 - The Treason of Isengard is published in the UK.
* 2000 - The Brazilian Tolkien society Conselho Branco
* 2017 - The second edition of The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide will be published.
